page.title: 15SUTTONS SOCIAL PROBLEMS
page.content: 1.Do you think there should be a casualty department in Sutton? Y 64 N 11 2.Do you think Sutton has a litter problem? Y 55 N 19 ? 2 3. Do you think there are enough facilities in Sutton for the young? Y 35 N 34 ? 6 4. Do you think there are enough facilities for the elderly? Y 39 N 35 ? 3 5. Do you think there are enough facilities for the disabled? Y 17 N 49 ? 9 6. Do you think their should be a trian station in Sutton? Y 46 N 27 ? 2 7. Is there too much vandalism? Y 63 N 12 By Mark Taylor.
